unlock.intermediate: Complete your first action to unlock more tips
unlock.advanced: Return later to discover advanced features

settings.title: Hint Settings
settings.hintsEnabledDescription: Display contextual tips throughout the application
settings.advancedFeaturesDescription: Reveal tips for power user features
settings.resetDescription: Show all hints again as if you were a new user

create.title: Create Your First Dossier
create.content: Dossiers help you organize information about countries, organizations, forums, and more.

types.title: Choose the Right Type
types.content: Select from Country, Organization, Forum, Working Group, or Person dossiers based on what you're tracking.

relationships.title: Connect Your Dossiers
relationships.content: Link related dossiers to build a network of relationships and see the bigger picture.
relationships.expanded: Use the Relationships tab to create connections between entities like MOUs, partnerships, or memberships.

documents.title: Attach Documents
documents.content: Keep all relevant files in one place by attaching documents to your dossiers.

briefs.title: Generate AI Briefs
briefs.content: Let AI summarize your dossier information into concise briefing documents.

shortcuts.title: Quick Navigation
shortcuts.content: Press Ctrl+K (Cmd+K on Mac) to quickly search and navigate to any dossier.

create.title: Track Your Engagements
create.content: Engagements help you manage meetings, events, and interactions with stakeholders.

calendar.title: Calendar Integration
calendar.content: View your engagements on a calendar to plan your schedule effectively.

afterAction.title: Record After-Action Notes
afterAction.content: Document outcomes, commitments, and follow-up items after each engagement.
afterAction.expanded: After-action records help track what was discussed and ensure nothing falls through the cracks.

link.title: Link to Dossiers
link.content: Connect engagements to relevant dossiers for better context and tracking.

analytics.title: Engagement Analytics
analytics.content: View insights about your engagement patterns and stakeholder relationships.

overview.title: Your Work Dashboard
overview.content: See all your tasks, commitments, and follow-ups in one unified view.

priorities.title: Manage Priorities
priorities.content: Use the Kanban board to organize work by status and priority.

filters.title: Filter Your View
filters.content: Use filters to focus on specific types of work or time periods.
filters.expanded: Filter by source (tasks, commitments, intake), status, priority, or due date.

deadlines.title: Track Deadlines
deadlines.content: Items are color-coded by urgency to help you stay on top of deadlines.

bulk.title: Bulk Actions
bulk.content: Select multiple items to update status, assign, or complete in bulk.

events.title: Schedule Events
events.content: Add meetings, deadlines, and important dates to your calendar.

views.title: Multiple Views
views.content: Switch between month, week, and day views to see your schedule.

recurring.title: Recurring Events
recurring.content: Set up events that repeat daily, weekly, monthly, or on custom schedules.

link.title: Link to Records
link.content: Connect calendar events to engagements and dossiers for context.

sync.title: Calendar Sync
sync.content: Sync with external calendars like Google Calendar or Outlook.

conflicts.title: Conflict Detection
conflicts.content: The system automatically detects scheduling conflicts and suggests alternatives.

upload.title: Upload Documents
upload.content: Store and organize important files in a central location.

organize.title: Stay Organized
organize.content: Attach documents to dossiers and engagements for easy retrieval.

search.title: Search Content
search.content: Search within document contents to find what you need quickly.
search.expanded: Full-text search works on PDFs, Word documents, and other text-based files.

versions.title: Version History
versions.content: Track changes with automatic version history for all documents.

ocr.title: OCR Support
ocr.content: Scanned documents are automatically processed to make text searchable.

templates.title: Document Templates
templates.content: Create templates for commonly used document types.
